manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Lotion for Everyone Everyone 3-in-1 Lotion made with Pure Essential Oils + Organic Plant Extracts + Love.

Everyone makes natural, affordable body care for every body. Good for you, your family, and the planet we all share. Love, everyone. 3-in-1 Lotion with Plant Extracts + Essential Oils for Face, Hands, Body Everyone 3-in-1 lotions are moisturizing enough for your hands and body and light enough to for your face. Pure essential oils give these awesome lotions their light scent and plant extracts like Coconut Oil, Aloe Vera, and nutrient-rich Vitamin E leave your skin visibly softer, smoother, and more radiant. Always paraben-free, cruelty-free, gluten-free, GMO-free, synthetic color & dye free, synthetic fragrance-free, and made with love in California. Love, everyone.

Made with Pure Essential Oils Everyone products are always made with pure essential oils so you can enjoy the beauty of aromatherapy every time you use an everyone product. Everyone 3-in-1 Lotion comes in a variety of relaxing and uplifting essential oil blends like Coconut + Lemon, Lavender + Aloe, Citrus + Mint, Mint + Coconut, and the gentle Unscented. You’ll find a whole lot of love in every everyone product but you won’t find synthetic scents, ever. That’s our promise. Love, everyone. Made With Love by Our Family We’re a family owned and operated company, the same two people who started making essential oil products in 1994 are still guiding our business every day. We work in a zero waste facility, our bottles are made with recycled plastic, and we’re dedicated to putting people, the planet, and our purpose before profit. We make our products ourselves, in our facility in California, so we know what goes into each bottle of everyone: plant extracts, pure essential oils, and a whole lotta love. Love, everyone. Lotion For Face, Hands, and Body Everyone 3-in-1 Lotions are an easy way to bring aromatherapy into your life every day. Made with skin loving plant extracts like Coconut Oil, Organic Aloe Vera and Chamomile and scented with pure essential oil blends that will uplift and delight your senses every time you massage some of this light and easily absorbing lotion into your skin. These lotions are light enough to use on your face and deeply moisturizing enough to use on your hands and body. Generously sized for the whole family. Love, everyone. Made With Natural + Organic Plant Extracts Everyone 3-in-1 lotions are made with skin loving plant extracts, and many of them are organic because we believe in supporting organic farms. Everyone 3-in-1 lotions are made with ingredients like Organic Coconut Oil, Sesame Oil, Organic Aloe Vera, White Tea, Calendula, and Chamomile extracts to leave your skin looking softer, smoother, and more radiant. Love, everyone. Citrus + Mint Lavender + Aloe Mint + Coconut Unscented

All of our products are certified Cruelty-Free by the Leaping Bunny Organization because we don’t think body care should ever come at the cost of animals – in the lab or the wild. Visit http://www.leapingbunny.org to see a list of our products. We have all of our products tested and certified gluten free for folks with gluten intolerances and sensitivities. We choose ingredients that are inclusive, like our gluten-free oat extract that soothes skin without triggering allergies. Certified by the Gluten Intolerance Group (GIG). Certificate 67575. Issued 4/30/2018. We partnered with the non-GMO Project in 2011 and became the first body care company to certify that our products are free from genetically modified organisms. We only use pure essential oils and plant extracts to scent our products. We have always been – and always will be – free from synthetic fragrances and the harmful additives that often hide within them. Visit https://www.nongmoproject.org to see a list of our Non GMO Project Verified Products. Synthetic Fragrance Free Since 1993, the Environmental Working Group has tracked chemical safety, and has called out bad chemicals and the companies that use them. When you see the EWG Verified mark on a product, you can be sure it's free from EWG's chemicals of concern and meets our strictest standards for your health. Visit https://www.ewg.org to see a list of our EWG Verified Products

Product Collection Diffuser, Aromatherapy Blends, Single Notes Moisturize, Tone, Exfoliate, Remove, Cleanse Shampoo, Conditioner, Styling Products Hand Soap, Hand Sanitizer, Lotions 3-in -1 Soaps for Every Body Scents Relax, Fresh, Focus, Balance, Lavender, Peppermint Ylang Ylang, Rose, Lavender Lavender, Lemon & Coconut, Rosemary & Mint Ylang Ylang & Cedarwood, Apricot & Vanilla, Meyer Lemon Lavender & Aloe, Lemon & Coconut, Unscented, Cedar & Citrus, Mint & Coconut Made With Organic Plant Extracts ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ GMO Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Gluten Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Cruelty Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Pure Essential Oils ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Family Owned ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Delicious scent, awesome lotion, highly recommended!
reviews.reviewText: I'm loving this lotion! It was my first time trying this brand, but I decided to go for it based on the good reviews and the large size you get for the price. I especially love the scent. It's both coconut and lemon, without being too much so on either end of the spectrum and without having a synthetic or chemical tone to it. It smells very natural and although it's scented strongly enough to definitely enjoy it for awhile after applying, it's not overwhelming. It's got kind of a "yummy" scent to it, like a lemon/coconut cream cookie, but it's not sickeningly sweet or way too feminine like some lotions and creams I've tried. I will say that the scent probably falls a little more on the feminine side, but not in a flowery way. I'm sure many guys would also enjoy it. I know they have a cedar/citrus version for men too though if that's a concern.As for the lotion itself, it's light, but not runny, very hydrating, but not super thick. It absorbs extremely quickly and doesn't leave any oily or sticky residue. There also isn't any of that "thick" feeling layer where you can tell most of the product is just kind of sitting on top of your skin. This soaks right in. My hands get extremely dry in the Colorado winters and this is moisturizing enough to keep them feeling soft and smooth, but I don't have to wait for it to absorb or be left with oily hands. I even find myself reapplying it throughout the day as I pass my nightstand just to enjoy the yummy scent. I definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The people's lotion. (Coconut-Lemon + and awesome moisturizer = Dream Team)
reviews.reviewText: EO's coconut-lemon lotion is by far my favorite year-round product. In the summer, spring, and most of fall, it makes for a great body lotion and thin face moisturizer is perfect for use right out of the shower. During the colder winter months, a thicker layer of this lotion is better as facial product, although for legs, hands and body it's still good, just maybe in need of an extra layering when the humidity and temperature really drop. I've tried both the orange mint and this scent, and the coconut-lemon is far superior (the mint is nice, but the mis with the orange is slightly off, although I happily used it as a leg lotion w/the coco-lemon as a face, arms and neck lotion). The smell is reminiscent of a lemon tart, and is the perfect barely-there everyday scent. Well worth the buy, and it seems to last forever! (each 32 fl oz. pump has lasted me at least a year).- Compared to other lotions: I've used Aveeno jars, Nivea bottles, and Jergens pumps in the past, but this is the one that is convenient to use right out of there shower, absorbs quickly, and leaves you feeling fresh and soft as opposed to greasy and bland. While not sufficient alone as a hand lotion when it's actually needed (dry, flaky, winter), it does live up to it's multi-use claim.-As for the actual pump container, it's extremely stable and doesn't fall over easily. When I have knocked it down from a sink or shelf, the plastic shows no damage and if anything, only a bit of lotion gets pumped out. The pump is VERY convenient, and only 2-3 pumps are needed for full-body coverage. (~1/4 pump for face)OVERALL:-great scent-lives up to 3-1 claim (only hand lotion aspect is semi-shaky)-great for warm months, good as base moisture for colder, drier months-good price/quality & quanity (lasts long, works well)-well worth it, especially in competition with more traditional brandsThis is my 3rd or 4th bottle of EO lotion, and I'll be sticking around for more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Greatest Soap Products on Earth.
reviews.reviewText: I am taking the time to post the ingredients to this soap for your reading pleasure. This is one of the best soaps on the market and it is all natural. There are no garbage ingredients or poisons that the big manufacturers put in their products. Remember, your skin is a sponge and anything that you put on it is absorbed into your blood stream. It IS time to stop using poison products and start supporting companies that put together healthful products for us to use. The price is fantastic due to the amount that you get in the bottle and how long it lasts. I have calculated it to be about $ 3.00 dollars per month. you can't buy two bars of disgusting Irish Spring or Dove or any of the garbage soaps full of poison for that price. Here are a list of ingredients. I have used most scents of this product and my current infatuation is the Coconut and Lemon. The scent just makes you smile because it is so clean. 3 in 1: shampoo, body wash, bath - perfect for a cleansing shampoo, invigorating shower and a fragrant, luxurious, bath pure and natural - gentle enough for the whole family for the informed, practical, value-conscious consumer pure essential oils nurture and soothe the skin gentle and fragrant with ingredients and essential oils that are pure, natural and organic cruelty free, paraben free, polysorbate free, disodium EDTA free, gluten free, non-GMO verified, sodium laureth/lauryl sulfate free.Ingredients found in this product:Purified Water, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Coco-Sulfate, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Sodium Chloride, Coco-Glucoside, Panthenol, Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Peel Oil, Organic Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Extract, EO Organic Herbal Blend [Organic Aloe Barbadensis Leaf, Organic Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Organic Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, and Organic Camelia Sinensis Leaf Extract], Citric Acid, Sodium Phytate, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, Tocopherol
